name: Standard Motor Products, Inc.
description: Standard Motor Products, Inc. is a leading manufacturer and distributor of automotive replacement parts, focusing primarily on the aftermarket sector. Established in 1919, the company has built a robust portfolio of products that includes engine management components, temperature control products, and fuel delivery systems. With a commitment to quality and innovation, SMP serves a diverse range of customers, including automotive distributors, retailers, and repair shops across North America and beyond. The company operates several manufacturing and distribution facilities, which enable it to efficiently meet the demands of its customers. SMP's extensive product line features over 40,000 parts, covering a wide variety of vehicle makes and models. As the automotive industry evolves with advancements in technology and environmental standards, SMP is dedicated to enhancing its product offerings through research and development, ensuring compatibility with the latest automotive trends and emissions regulations. The company prides itself on its customer service and technical support, helping clients navigate the complexities of the automotive aftermarket. With a strong focus on sustainability and operational excellence, SMP continues to be a trusted partner in the automotive replacement parts industry.
headquarters: Long Island City, New York, USA
